text.autoconfig.moundertweaks.option.sho: Enable grinding of cobblestone to gravel and gravel to sand by right-clicking with a shovel
text.autoconfig.moundertweaks.option.exp: Enable use of gunpowder as a furnace fuel
text.autoconfig.moundertweaks.option.fie: Enable use of blaze powder as a furnace fuel
text.autoconfig.moundertweaks.option.lav: Enable conversion of Sand to Glass when touching lava
